name: Dr. Maybee and the Adventures of Scarygirl
name_original: Dr. Maybee and the Adventures of Scarygirl
description:
Explore the surreal world of Scarygirl as you embark on a journey to uncover the secret of her identity while exposing the mysteries of her past. A one of a kind cast of characters including Scarygirl, a pirate clad adventurer with her tentacle-like arm, Bunniguru a mysterious wandering rabbit sage, Blister an overly enthusiastic giant octopus and Dr. Maybee the creepy wandering scientist.
Try out special moves while you jump, fight, swing and spin your way through this platform style adventure set in the dreamlike environment of Scarygirl.
